hypothesis_content.title: SOL Weekend Volatility Surge Predictive of Monday Momentum
hypothesis_content.statement: When SOL experiences >8% price range (high-low) during weekend trading (Saturday-Sunday UTC), Monday's opening 4-hour momentum continues in the weekend's dominant direction with 65%+ accuracy during BULL regimes.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Weekend volatility in altcoins like SOL often reflects organic retail/institutional interest that continues into institutional trading hours on Monday, especially during bull markets when sentiment is positive.
entry_conditions: SOL weekend (Sat 00:00 to Sun 23:59 UTC) price range > 8%
Determine weekend direction (close Sunday vs close Friday)
Enter Monday at market open in weekend direction

exit_conditions.time_exit: Monday 16:00 UTC (4 hours after CME open)

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Monday opening 4-hour move contradicts weekend direction >50% of instances, or weekend volatility shows no predictive power for Monday session.
